lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy
Interface Copier

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultCopier, IfcCopier
public interface Copier

The interface to be implemented by clients that are to be returned by extend the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy.copierfactoryext. The extension point allows for customisation of the copying process that creates new base elements corresponding to existing advice elements. Implementations of this interface perform the copying itself whereas the extension point CopierFactoryExt only has to be implemented in order to return the right implementation instance of this interface.

Attention: All registered extensions for this extension point are called in order of decreasing priority (i.e. starting with the extension having the highest integer value priority) while passing on the initial result to the next extension.

Method Summary
 org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject copyAvElement(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject sourceAvElement, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject currentBaseVariant, AdviceEffectuation avEffectuation)
          Returns an existing or new base variant copy of the given advice element for the given advice effectuation using the given current base variant of the advice element.
 

Method Detail

copyAvElement

org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject copyAvElement(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject sourceAvElement,
                                            org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject currentBaseVariant,
                                            AdviceEffectuation avEffectuation)
Returns an existing or new base variant copy of the given advice element for the given advice effectuation using the given current base variant of the advice element.

Parameters:
sourceAvElement - the advice element to be used as source of the copying
currentBaseVariant - the currently obtained base variant copy of the given advice element
avEffectuation - an advice effectuation
Returns:
a (possibly new) base variant copy of the given advice element
